mapper.insert:
insert into db_proxy.sardine_returnSupplierBill
uuid,
companyUuid,
billNumber,
rtnSupplierNtcBillNumber,
supplierUuid,
supplierCode,
supplierName,
wrhUuid,
wrhCode,
wrhName,
returnerUuid,
returnerCode,
returnerName,
method,
state,
totalCaseQty,
totalAmount,
returnSupplierDate,
version, CREATEDTIME, CREATEDID, CREATEDCODE, CREATEDNAME, LASTMODIFYTIME, LASTMODIFYID, LASTMODIFYCODE, LASTMODIFYNAME,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{billNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rtnSupplierNtcBillNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplier.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplier.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplier.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wrh.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wrh.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wrh.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{returner.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{returner.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{returner.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalCaseQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{returnSupplierDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update db_proxy.sardine_returnSupplierBill
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalCaseQty = #{totalCaseQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalAmount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTMODIFYTIME = #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMODIFYID = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYCODE = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYNAME = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} + 1
UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version = #{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into db_proxy.sardine_returnSupplierBillItem
uuid,
returnSupplierBillUuid,
line,
articleUuid,
articleCode,
articleName,
spec,
qpcStr,
munit,
binCode,
containerBarcode,
qty,
caseQtyStr,
productionDate,
validDate,
returnSupplierDate,
amount,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{returnSupplierBillUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{line,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{article.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{article.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{article.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qpcStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{munit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{binCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{containerBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{caseQtyStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{returnSupplierDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select:
select s.*, s.billuuid sourcebilluuid, s.billtype sourcebilltype, s.billnumber sourcebillnumber, s.articlespec spec from db_proxy.sardine_stock s,db_proxy.sardine_bin b where s.bincode = b.code and s.companyuuid = b.companyuuid and b.binusage = 'SupplierCollectBin' and s.STATE = 'normal' and s.companyuuid = #{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and s.articleCode like CONCAT('%',#{articleCodeLike},'%')
and s.bincode like CONCAT('%',#{binCodeLike},'%')
and s.containerbarcode like CONCAT('%',#{containerBarcodeLike},'%')
and s.suppliercode like CONCAT('%',#{supplierCodeLike},'%')
